globalLogin.text: You are not logged in right now. Log in and earn points with your actions.

globalCampaignClosed.text: This campaign has ended. Interactions are no longer possible.

deleteUser.subheader: Sorry that you are leaving! Please confirm the deletion of your profile below. In order to keep a good record of the discussions in the Creative Museum, we would like to continue to display your contributions anonymously. Please choose how you would like to handle your content:

options.permanent: I want to permanently delete all my posts and comments.
options.anonymize: I agree that my contributions will remain as anonymous.

provideUsername.title: Define Username
provideUsername.alreadyTaken: Oops! Sorry, this username is already taken.

step1.title: Welcome to Creative Museum!
step1.text: The Creative Museum is a participatory platform for debate and exchange. In the following steps, we will introduce you to the most important functions.

step2.title: Points
step2.text: With all your actions in the Creative Museum, you collect points. You can later spend your points on awards to give away to other users. So here we go: Start collecting!

step3.title: Create Posts
step3.text: In the Creative Museum, you can share your own content and interact with others. Post a picture, text, video or audio contribution, your own survey or create a playlist from several contributions!

step4.title: Awards
step4.text: You can unlock different awards in each campaign by collecting points and then awarding them to other participants

step5.title: Badges
step5.text: Badges are awarded to you by completing various activities in Creative Museum. Why not try it now and comment on three posts!

delete.headline: Really Delete Post?
delete.confirmation: Please confirm that you really want to delete this post.

report.headline: Really Report Post?
report.confirmation: Please confirm that this post violates the Creative Museum Terms of Use and that you wish to report it to the editors.

errors.1657590177: Oops! The description is too long.

violation.23bd9dbf-6b9b-41cd-a99e-4844bcf3077f: Oops! Sorry, this username is already taken.

edit.personalNotifications: Personal Notifications (Comments, awards and badges received, reported posts)
edit.cmNotifications: Creative Museum Notifications (New campaign available, campaign ended)

placeholder.description: Your profile description can be here.

result.description: This campaign "{campaign}" has ended. The users who have given the most awards are:

awards.givenConfirmText: You gave the award "{title}" for {price} points to {username}!
awards.noAvailable: We are sorry! Currently you don't have any awards that you can give away.

violations.1661952434: Stop! You can not give yourself an award ;)
violations.1661952502: Attention! You must be a participant in the campaign to receive this award.
violations.1661952537: Oh no! You don't have enough points. Earn more by joining the campaign.
violations.1661952565: Unfortunately, you can't! You have already given this award.
violations.1664887726: Oops! You can't give awards to deleted users.

subjects.system: You have received a message from the Creative Museum
subjects.editor: New message from the system editor

1662032613.title: Award Strike
1662032613.text: You have earned {points} points for giving away an award in the ´{campaign}´ campaign!

1662032722.title: Award Strike
1662032722.text: You have earned {points} points because you have been awarded an award in the ´{campaign}´ campaign!

1662032767.title: Comment Score
1662032767.text: You have received {points} points for your comment in the ´{campaign}´ campaign!

1662032840.text: You have received {points} points for your feedback in the ´{campaign}´ campaign!

1662032958.title: Post Score
1662032958.text: You have earned {points} points for your post in the ´{campaign}´ campaign!

1662033166.title: Registration Strike
1662033166.text: You have received {points} points in the campaign ´{campaign}´ for your registration in the Creative Museum!

1662033222.title: Voting Score
1662033222.text: You have received {points} points for your voting in the campaign ´{campaign}´!

1662033562.title: Post reported
1662033562.text: Thank you for your message! We will check the post for inappropriateness.

1662114392.text: One of your posts has been reported as inappropriate and is being reviewed!
